definition: to take shelter from the wind/to lie low/to stay out of trouble
to avoid/to shun/to flee/to escape/to keep away from/to leave/to hide from
to lie low (until the fuss dies down)

sentences.english: I long for family, because family is the best haven.
sentences.chinese: 我恋家，因为家是最好的避风港。

sentences.english: In this context, porn is a safe haven for male sexual anxieties.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况下，不雅物是性焦虑男性的避风港。

sentences.english: The workers were brewing up in a sheltered corner of the building-site.
sentences.chinese: 工人们在建筑工地的避风处泡茶喝。

sentences.english: The islands spreading around the water area acting as the natural barriers against wind .
sentences.chinese: 港域有岛屿作为天然屏障，避风条件好。

sentences.english: There he planned to evade Kil'jaeden's wrath and plan his next moves.
sentences.chinese: 伊利丹决定在这里避避风头并计划他的下一步行动。

sentences.english: US Treasuries are the safe haven.
sentences.chinese: 美国国债是安全的避风港。

sentences.english: But these new megacities are havens for religious revivals.
sentences.chinese: 但这些大都市却是宗教复兴的避风港。

sentences.english: The gigantic natural harbour of Poole is a haven for boats.
sentences.chinese: 巨型天然港普尔港是船只的避风港。

sentences.english: Can high-yielding equities suddenly be a safe haven?
sentences.chinese: 高收益股票能否突然成为一个避风港？

sentences.english: I can lie now there, may be sniff out a job when things quiet down.
sentences.chinese: 我可以在那暂避风头，事情平息后找个工作。

sentences.english: Port regulation can not make afore -mentioned absoluteness video upload behavior lawful.
sentences.chinese: 避风港规则并不能使上述无限制的视频上传行为合法。

sentences.english: I'm an American, hiding in Sicily.
sentences.chinese: 我是个美国人，到西西里来避避风头。

sentences.english: Your relationship should be a haven from the storms of life.
sentences.chinese: 你们的关系将从生命的暴风雨抵达避风港。

sentences.english: Home is your alcazar and safe harbor.
sentences.chinese: 家就是你的城堡和避风港。

sentences.english: But Mr. K’s classroom was a haven.
sentences.chinese: 然而，科先生的课堂却是避风港。

sentences.english: The port has three bays and two shelter to hide the wind to avoid waves.
sentences.chinese: 港内有三个海湾和两个避风塘能躲风避浪。

definition: lit. to avoid the wind/fig. to keep low to avoid a difficult situation/to stay out of trouble
to stop on the way for a rest
to give shelter from the wind and rain/to keep out the elements
to sleep outdoors/to spend the night in the open
to take shelter from the rain
to let air pass through/to ventilate
